data.name: Running Remote Conference
data.description: 2-day conference focused on managing remote teams. Learn from experts how to start and scale an office-less business. 20-21 April, Austin, TX. Get your Pass!

relatedRecords.name: Code BEAM SF
relatedRecords.description: Code BEAM SF is the only conference in the USA where we bring all the languages that run on the BEAM together. Discover how Erlang and Elixir are being used in industries and areas including IOT, Blockchain, Fintech, Security, Machine Learning and many more.

relatedRecords.name: Code Workshop Halloween Party 2019
relatedRecords.description: Join us for our annual Halloween party when the spirits come out to code. Costumes not required, but always appreciated. Celebrate with lightning talks, a Halloweenn hackathon with great prizes, and Open Source Trick-or-Treat goodies and awesome food.
